attributes.action: Encourage FULL support for British Troops irrespective of the politics involved
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the Falklands War in 1982, there was 100% support for British Troops... including flag waving,and media support.
It doesn't feel that today re AFGHANISTAN the real source of this terror conflict, and Iraq
The media reports on the deaths of our troops, and innocent civilians on a daily basis which can on sap the support energy and breed hostility towards everyone involved in the 2 conflicts I cite above.
Irrespective of politics, the troops themselves were ordered to go to AFGHANISTAN and Iraq by Tony Blair - the then ELECTED Leader of our Country.
They are doing what they are trained to do.
The least we can do is show FULL support for each and every one of our fighting British Troops, no matter HOW LONG this conflict goes on for them & thier Families. 
The media should be more forth-coming in thier public support instead of constantly criticising and stirring the public up. The stories of how we ARE helping the local people in AFGHANSTAN and Iraq SHOULD outweigh the constant negative & argumentative stories.
Let our British Troops get on with thier job, THEN let the media deal with the politics and politicians on the matter of AFGHANISTAN and Iraq.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
